member.name: T:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings
member.summary: Extracts the image output and encoding settings from the querystring. Handles the saving of Image instances to a Stream using the .SaveImage method Doesn't handle animated image files - only single frames. (Neither does GDI)

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.Quality
member.summary: The Jpeg compression quality. 90 is the best setting.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.Colors
member.summary: The number of colors to use. Only applicable for png, gif, and bmp photos where palletes can be used. The default is -1, which means "as much color fidelity as possible".

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.Dither
member.summary: Enables dithering for PNG8 and GIF

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.GetFinalExtension
member.summary: Returns the file extension for the current OutputFormat

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.GetContentType
member.summary: Returns the content type for the current OutputFormat

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.SaveImageToNonSeekableStream(System.IO.Stream,System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Safe for use with non-seekable streams. Writes the Png memory to an intermediate MemoryStream. Does use more memory on PNGs. FileStreams are seekable.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.SaveImage(System.IO.Stream,System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Requires a seekable string for Png encoding. Use SaveImageToNonSeekableStream for non-seekable streams.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.GetSupportedOutputFormat(System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: If the specified ImageFormat is not supported for output, ImageFormat.Jpeg is returned.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.GetRequestedType(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Returns the ImageFormat requested in the querystring.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.GetImageFormatFromPhysicalPath(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the ImageFormat enumeration value based on the extension in the specified physical path.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.GetImageFormatFromExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an ImageFormat instance from the specfied extension. Supports jpg, jpeg, bmp, gif, png, tiff, and tff. returns null if not recognized.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.GetExtensionFromImageFormat(System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Returns an string instance from the specfied ImageFormat. Supports jpg, bmp, gif, png, and tiff, Returns null if not recognized.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.IsAcceptedImageType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the extension on the virtual path 'path' is one of the accepted types

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings._acceptedImageExtensions
member.summary: Returns a list of (lowercase invariant) image extensions that the module works with.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.GetContentTypeFromImageFormat(System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Supports Png, Jpeg, Gif, Bmp, and Tiff.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.SaveJpeg(System.Drawing.Image,System.Int32,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves the specified image to the specified stream using jpeg compression of the specified quality.
member.param: A number between 0 and 100. Defaults to 90 if passed a negative number. Numbers over 100 are truncated to 100. 90 is a *very* good setting.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.SavePng(System.Drawing.Image,System.IO.Stream,System.Byte)
member.summary: Requires seekable stream, i.e. MemoryString or FileStream

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.SavePng(System.Drawing.Image,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Requires seekable stream, i.e. MemoryString or FileStream

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.SaveBmp(System.Drawing.Image,System.IO.Stream,System.Byte)
member.summary: Saves the bitmap

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.GetBitsNeededForColorDepth(System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns how many bits are required to store the specified number of colors. Performs a Log2() on the value.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.GetImageCodeInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the first ImageCodeInfo instance with the specified mime type. Returns null if there are no matches.

member.name: P:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.OutputFormat
member.summary: If you set this to an unsupported output format (anything other than png, gif, or jpg), it will be the same as settting it to Jpeg. Input is autocorrected.

member.name: P:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings.SupportsTransparency
member.summary: Returns true if the desired output type supports transparency.

member.name: T:fbs.ImageResizer.WatermarkSettings
member.summary: Provides extensibility points for drawing watermarks and even modifying resizing/image settings

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.WatermarkSettings.#ctor(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Creates a new WatermarkSettings class

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.WatermarkSettings.ModifySettings(fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings,fbs.ImageResizer.ImageSettings,fbs.ImageResizer.ImageFilter,fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings)
member.summary: Executed prior to resizing. Permits modifications of geometry and effect settings

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.WatermarkSettings.Process(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Modify this to do watermarks. Executing after resizing is complete

member.name: T:fbs.yrl
member.summary: Enapsulates a mutable (changable) site-relative URL. Note that "" is equivalent to the application root directory in YRL notation (the ~/ is implicit, always). QueryFindYrlVerifyID can be removed if external dependencies aren't allowed. It uses fbs.Articles.Index.FindPathByID() This class is designed to standardize path interpretation and conversion.

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.BaseFile
member.summary: The base file, usually a .aspx page. Ex. 'home.aspx' or 'admin/new.aspx'. Can also be a base directory, such as articles

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.QueryString
member.summary: A collection of name/value query paramaters. Do NOT UrlEncode/Decode these! That step will be done for you.

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a default instance of yrl which points to the application root directory.

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.FromString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a yrl object from a path. Returns null if the path cannot be parsed. (Out of application bounds, or an invalid character). The tilde is an invalid character unless used as the app-relative specifier.
member.param: A path Each query paramater will be UrlDecoded.

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.FromYrlString(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance from a yrl-syntax string (virtual, but without ~/). Use FromString if you're not sure what type of syntax is used.

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.FromPhysicalString(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a yrl Instance from the specified physical path. Throws an exception if the path is outside the application structure.

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.GetAppFolderName
member.summary: either '/' or '/folder' like '/yf' or sometimes '/folder/folder'

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.TrimStartAppFolder(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the application folder from the specified path. Leaves the leading forwardslash. Assuming the Application path is /yf, this function will transform /yf/home.aspx to /home.aspx and /yf/css/john.css to /css/john.css If the application is located in '/', nothing will be done to the path. Transforms yf/home.aspx to /home.aspx, yf\home.aspx to \home.aspx, \yf\home.aspx to \home.aspx Won't work if the app folder has a child directory named the same!

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.GetPathType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the type of path

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.Copy
member.summary: Creates a deep copy of the yrl

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.ToString
member.summary: Returns a site-root-relative path along with query paramaters

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the hash codes of the two instances.

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a unique hash code derived from the URL property of this instance

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.ChangeExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the old extension and replaces it with the specified extension. A leading '.' is not neccesary

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.GetNextAvailableDerivitive
member.summary: Returns the next unused filename similar to the current one,by incrementing (i)

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.Combine(fbs.yrl,fbs.yrl)
member.summary: Joins two yrls. Querystrings on either are discarded.

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.CreateAbsoluteUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an absolute path to the current yrl using the specified base path
member.param: A base path like http://youngfoundations.org/ or http://localhost:2755/yf/

member.name: M:fbs.yrl.IsNullOrEmpty(fbs.yrl)
member.summary: Returns true if the yrl is null or empty (site root)

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.QueryID
member.summary: yrl.QueryString["id"] Returns -1 if not found, -2 if unparseable

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.QueryPath
member.summary: yrl.QueryString["path"]. Returns null if not found, throws exception if not parseable.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.QueryDir
member.summary: yrl.QueryString["dir"]. Returns null if not found, throws exception if not parseable.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.QueryFindID
member.summary: Tries to track down the ID by looking at QueryString["id"], then QueryString["path"]. Returns -1 if unsuccessful

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.Local
member.summary: Returns the physical filesystem path for this yrl

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.Virtual
member.summary: Returns the virtual path(~/...)of the base file without query paramaters.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.VirtualURL
member.summary: Returns the virtual path (~/...) of the base file with query paramaters appended.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.NavigateURL
member.summary: Returns a ~/ path designed for the Hyperlink.NavigateUrl property

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.URL
member.summary: Returns root-relative URL with query paramaters in the form 'articles/00001002 article.aspx'

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.URLEncoded
member.summary: Returns root-relative URL with query paramaters in the form 'articles/00001002%20article.aspx'

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.URLHtmlEncoded
member.summary: Returns root-relative URL with query paramaters in the form 'articles/00001002%20article.aspx'. Encodes special characters into HTML entities using Server.URLPathEncode

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.URLAnchorTarget
member.summary: Returns a domain-relative path in the form '/yf/articles/00001002%20article.aspx'

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.RelativeURL
member.summary: Returns relaitve URL with query paramaters in the form '../articles/00001002 article.aspx'

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.ID
member.summary: Returns the ID if a leading 8-digit ID is found in the base file. Returns -1 otherwise

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.FirstID
member.summary: Returns first leading ID found in a segment of the path.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.FileExists
member.summary: Returns true if BaseFile exists as a local file.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.DirExists
member.summary: Returns true if BaseFile exists as a local Directory.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.DirInfo
member.summary: Returns a DirectoryInfo object for BaseFile if it is a directory. If not, it returns the parent directory

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.Parent
member.summary: Returns a yrl of the parent directory. If the current yrl is already the root, returns null; Use

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.Directory
member.summary: Returns the directory portion of this yrl.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.Root
member.summary: Returns an instance of yrl that points to the application root.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.Current
member.summary: Returns the REAL file that is being executed. Falls back to CurrentBrowserUrl if unavailable. Unavailable if UrlRewritingNet isn't in use

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.CurrentBrowserURL
member.summary: Retreieves the current URL from HttpContext.Current.Request.Url (pre-rewrite path)

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.Referrer
member.summary: Returns null if unavailable

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.IsEmpty
member.summary: An empty yrl signifies the application root. This verifies both the path and the querystring are empty.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.IsRoot
member.summary: Returns true if the basefile is empty (the root) (the QueryString can have data). Use IsEmpty to check that both are empty.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.IsInRoot
member.summary: Returns true if this path has no parent directory (the parent directory is the root).

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.Name
member.summary: Returns the name of the directory (like 'archives') if it is one, and the name of the file (like 'universal.css') if it is a file.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.NameWithoutExtension
member.summary: Returns the name of BaseFile without the extension.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.PrettyTitle
member.summary: Returns the filename without the ID or extension, converts underscores to spaces, and trims the string.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.FilenameWithoutIdAndExtension
member.summary: Returns the filename minus path information, extensions, or Article ID.

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.Extension
member.summary: Returns the extension of BaseFile in the form '.aspx'

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.IsAspx
member.summary: returns true if BaseFile ends with .aspx

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.IsCodeFile
member.summary: returns true if BaseFile ends with .cs or .vb

member.name: P:fbs.yrl.FindAssociatedMarkupFile
P:fbs.yrl.FindAssociatedCodeFile
T:fbs.yrl.PathType
member.summary: Path syntaxes, determined by patterns.

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.PathType.UNCPath
member.summary: \\server\share\

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.PathType.BackslashPath
member.summary: A path like '\temp\file.htm'

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.PathType.DriveletterColonBackslashPath
member.summary: A path like 'c:\program files\temp'

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.PathType.PathBackslashPath
member.summary: a path like 'img\file.img'

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.PathType.TildeForwardslashPath
member.summary: a path like '~/home.aspx'

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.PathType.ForwardslashPath
member.summary: a path like '/home.aspx'

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.PathType.PathForwardslashPath
member.summary: a path like 'img/banner.jpg'

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.PathType.ServerForwardslashPath
member.summary: a path like http://www.branham.org/home.aspx

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.PathType.File
member.summary: A filename with no path, like 'test.exe' or 'home.aspx'

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.PathType.Root
member.summary: Specifies the application root

member.name: F:fbs.yrl.PathType.Invalid
member.summary: Indeterminant form

member.name: T:ImageQuantization.Quantizer
member.summary: Summary description for Class1.

member.name: M:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Construct the quantizer
member.param: If true, the quantization only needs to loop through the source pixels once
member.remarks: If you construct this class with a true value for singlePass, then the code will, when quantizing your image, only call the 'QuantizeImage' function. If two passes are required, the code will call 'InitialQuantizeImage' and then 'QuantizeImage'.

member.name: F:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.fourPass
member.summary: If true, image is re-paletted after quantization, and dithering occurs on a separate frame from the source.

member.name: M:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.Quantize(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Quantize an image and return the resulting output bitmap
member.param: The image to quantize
member.returns: A quantized version of the image

member.name: M:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.FirstPass(System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Execute the first pass through the pixels in the image
member.param: The source data
The width in pixels of the image
The height in pixels of the image

member.name: M:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.SecondPass(System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData,System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData,System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Execute a second pass through the bitmap. If dithering is enabled, sourceData will be modified.
member.param: The source bitmap, locked into memory
The intermediate bitmap, used for 4-pass quantization. If specified, output will not actually be modified
The output bitmap
The width in pixels of the image
The height in pixels of the image
The bounding rectangle

member.name: M:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.InitialQuantizePixel(ImageQuantization.Quantizer.Color32)
member.summary: Override this to process the pixel in the first pass of the algorithm
member.param: The pixel to quantize
member.remarks: This function need only be overridden if your quantize algorithm needs two passes, such as an Octree quantizer.

member.name: M:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.QuantizePixel(ImageQuantization.Quantizer.Color32)
member.summary: Override this to process the pixel in the second pass of the algorithm
member.param: The pixel to quantize

member.name: M:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.GetPalette(System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette)
member.summary: Retrieve the palette for the quantized image
member.param: Any old palette, this is overrwritten

member.name: F:ImageQuantization.Quantizer._singlePass
member.summary: Flag used to indicate whether a single pass or two passes are needed for quantization.

member.name: T:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.Color32
member.summary: Struct that defines a 32 bpp colour
member.remarks: This struct is used to read data from a 32 bits per pixel image in memory, and is ordered in this manner as this is the way that the data is layed out in memory

member.name: F:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.Color32.Blue
member.summary: Holds the blue component of the colour

member.name: F:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.Color32.Green
member.summary: Holds the green component of the colour

member.name: F:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.Color32.Red
member.summary: Holds the red component of the colour

member.name: F:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.Color32.Alpha
member.summary: Holds the alpha component of the colour

member.name: F:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.Color32.ARGB
member.summary: Permits the color32 to be treated as an int32

member.name: P:ImageQuantization.Quantizer.Color32.Color
member.summary: Return the color for this Color32 object

member.name: T:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCacheException
member.summary: Indicates a problem with disk caching. Causes include a missing (or too small) ImageDiskCacheDir setting, and severe I/O locking preventing the cache dir from being cleaned at all.

member.name: T:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache
member.summary: Provides methods for creating, maintaining, and securing the disk cache. Extending this to work for database-sourced (or anything) vs disk-source data could be done by making alternative UpdateCachedVersionIfNeeded and IsCachedVersionValid methods that accept DateTime instances instead of filenames.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.webConfigFile
member.summary: This string contains the contents of a web.conig file that sets URL authorization to "deny all" inside the current directory.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.UpdateCachedVersionIfNeeded(System.String,System.String,fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.CacheUpdateCallback,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if an update is needed on the specified file... calls the method if needed. Fixed: Implement locking to prevent I/O conflicts on concurrent inital request Returns false if a lock on the source file could not be acquired within fileLockTimeout ms. -1 for indefinite wait - not reccomended! Only one resize operation can be performed on a source file at a time. This method enforces that, and should eliminte costly I/O 'access denied' messages. Of course, locking based on source filename also eliminates writing contention on cached files..

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.fileLocks
member.summary: The only objects in this collection should be for open files.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.IsCachedVersionValid(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Assumes localSourceFile exists. Returns true if localCachedFile exists and matches the last write time of localSourceFile.
member.param: full physical path of original file
full physical path of cached file.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.IsCachedVersionValid(System.DateTime,System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if localCachedFile exists and matches sourceDataModifiedUTC.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.PrepareCacheDir
member.summary: Creates the directory for caching if needed, and performs 'garbage collection' Throws a DiskCacheException if the cache direcotry isn't specified in web.config Creates a web.config file in the caching directory to prevent direct access.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.GetCacheDir
member.summary: Returns the physical path of the image cache dir. Calcualted from AppSettings["ImageDiskCacheDir"] (yrl form). throws an exception if missing

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.TrimDirectoryFiles(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes least-used files from the directory (if needed) Throws an exception if cleanup fails. Returns true if any files were deleted.
member.param: The directory to clean up
The maximum number of files to leave in the directory. Does nothing if this is less than 0
How many extra files to delete if deletions are required

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.CompareFiles(System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.DateTime},System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.DateTime})
member.summary: Compares the file dates on the arguments

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.RoughCompare(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns true if both dates are equal (to the nearest 200th of a second)

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.ClearCacheDir
member.summary: Clears the cache directory. Returns true if successful. (In-use files make this rare).

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.GetMaxWidth
member.summary: Returns the value of AppSettings["ImageResizerMaxWidth"], or 640 if the setting is missing

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.GetMaxHeight
member.summary: Returns the value of AppSettings["ImageResizerMaxHeight"], or 480 if the setting is missing

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.GetMaxCachedFiles
member.summary: Returns the value of required setting AppSettings["MaxCachedImages"], or 400 if it is missing. An event will be logged if it is missing.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.CacheDirExists
member.summary: Returns true if the image caching directory (GetCacheDir()) exists.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.GetCacheDirFilesCount
member.summary: Returns the number of files inside the image cache directory (recursive traversal)

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.GetCacheDirTotalSize
member.summary: Returns the summation of the size of the indiviual files in the image cache directory (recursive traversal)

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.GetAverageCachedFileSize
member.summary: Returns the average size of a file in the image cache directory. Expensive, calls GetCacheDirFilesCount() and GetCacheDirTotalSize()

member.name: T:fbs.ImageResizer.DiskCache.CacheUpdateCallback
member.summary: A callback method that will perform the resize and update the file. This doesn't need paramaters since an anonymous function can be used.

member.summary: Rounds the elements of the specified array [not used]

member.summary: Rounds the elements of the specified array [not used]

member.summary: Modifies the specified array by applying the specified function to each element.

member.summary: Rotates the specified polygon around the origin.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.ToPoly(System.Drawing.RectangleF)
member.summary: Returns a clockwise array of points on the rectangle. Point 0 is top-left.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.NormalizePoly(System.Drawing.PointF[])
member.summary: Moves the polygon so that the upper-left corner of its bounding box is located at 0,0.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.RotateVector(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Double)
member.summary: Rotates the specified point around the origin.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.ChangeMagnitude(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Single)
member.summary: Returns a modified version of the specified vector with the desired length.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.GetBoundingBox(System.Drawing.PointF[])
member.summary: Returns a bounding box for the specified set of points.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.MovePoly(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Returns a modified version of the array, with each element being offset by the specified amount.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.ArraysEqual(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.PointF[])
member.summary: Returns true if the member elements of the specified arrays match, and the arrays are of the same length.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.getParallelogram(System.Drawing.PointF[])
member.summary: Moves element 4 to spot 3 and truncates to 3 elements. For compatiblity with Graphics.DrawImage

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.GetSubArray(System.Drawing.PointF[0:,0:],System.Int32)
member.summary: Grabs a single-dimension array from a 2 dimensional array, using the specified primary index.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.GenerateRadialBrush(System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.PointF,System.Single)
member.summary: Approximates a radial brush using a high-rez PathGradientBrush.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.ScaleInside(System.Drawing.SizeF,System.Drawing.SizeF)
member.summary: Scales 'fitInside' to fit inside 'bounding' while maintaining aspect ratio. Upscales and downscales.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.FitsInside(System.Drawing.SizeF,System.Drawing.SizeF)
member.summary: Returns true if 'inner' fits inside or equals 'outer'

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.GetCorners(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Single)
member.summary:
Returns an array of parallelograms. These parallelgrams are the 'corners' outside each vertex in 'poly'. The adjacent edges are perpendicular to 'poly'. Point 1 of each parallelogram will match the respective point in 'poly' Points are clockwise.
TODO - some rounding issues going on, not exact numbers here

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.GetCorners(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Single[])
member.summary:
Returns an array of parallelograms. These parallelgrams are the 'corners' outside each vertex in 'poly'. The adjacent edges are perpendicular to 'poly'. Point 1 of each parallelogram will match the respective point in 'poly' Points are clockwise.
Each float in widths[] corresponds to the point in poly[]. This is the distance to go perpendicularly from the line beween poly[i] and poly[i +1].

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.GetSides(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Single)
member.summary: Returns an array of parallelograms. These parallelgrams are the 'sides' bounding the polygon. Points are clockwise. Point 1 is the top-left outer point, point 2 the top-right, point 3 the bottom-right, and point 4 the bottom-left.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.InflatePoly(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Single)
member.summary: Expands all sides on the specified polygon by the specified offset. Assumes the polygon is concave. Returns a new polygon

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.InflatePoly(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Single[])
member.summary: Expands all sides on the specified polygon by the specified offsets. Assumes the polygon is concave. Returns a new polygon.
member.param: An array the same size as poly[], with the distances to expand the edges. Edges are between i and i+1

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.PolygonMath.CenterInside(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.PointF[])
member.summary: Moves 'inner' so that the center of its bounding box equals the center of the bounding box of 'outer'

member.name: T:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings
member.summary: Extracts all of the resizing, cropping, stretching, rotation, and flipping settings. Merges the data in CalculateSizingData and returns the source rect, target poly, and target area poly. Flipping must be done separately.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.parseList(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Parses lists in the form "3,4,5,2,5" and "(3,4,40,50)". If a number cannot be parsed (i.e, number 2 in "5,,2,3") defaultValue is used.

members.member: Understands width, height, maxwidth, maxheight, rotate=deg, stretch=fill, (stretches images) stretch=proportionally(default) (letterboxes image with background color instead of stretching), crop=none (default) crop=auto (minimally crops to preserve aspect ratio), and crop=(x,y,x2,y2) (crops the source image to the specified rectangle)

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.parseFlip(System.String)
member.summary: Returns RotateNoneFlipNone if not a recognize value.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.rotate
member.summary: Degrees of rotation to apply

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.flip
member.summary: Applied last, after all effects.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.sourceFlip
member.summary: Flips the source image prior to processing.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.crop
member.summary: Crop settings. Defaults to None - letterboxing is used if stretch=p.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.stretch
member.summary: Whether to preserve aspect ratio or stretch.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.scale
member.summary: Whether to downscale, upscale, or allow both on images

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.CropMode.None
member.summary: Default. No cropping - uses letterboxing if strecth=proportionally and both width and height are specified.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.CropMode.Auto
member.summary: Minimally crops to preserve aspect ratio if stretch=proportionally.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.CropMode.Custom
member.summary: Crops using the custom crop rectangle. Letterboxes if stretch=proportionally and both widht and height are specified.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.StretchMode.Proportionally
member.summary: Maintains aspect ratio. Default.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.StretchMode.Fill
member.summary: Skews image to fit the new aspect ratio defined by 'width' and 'height'

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.ScaleMode.DownscaleOnly
member.summary: The default. Only downsamples images - never enlarges. If an image is smaller than 'width' and 'height', the image coordinates are used instead.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.ScaleMode.UpscaleOnly
member.summary: Only upscales (zooms) images - never downsamples except to meet web.config restrictions. If an image is larger than 'width' and 'height', the image coordinates are used instead.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.ScaleMode.Both
member.summary: Upscales and downscales images according to 'width' and 'height', within web.config restrictions.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.ImageSizingData.sourceRect
member.summary: The rectangular area of the original image to use

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.ImageSizingData.imageTarget
member.summary: The polygon on the new image to draw the image to. All 4 points are clockwise.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.ImageSizingData.targetArea
member.summary: The polygon space that will be required (includes letterboxing space). All 4 points are clockwise.

member.name: T:ImageQuantization.OctreeQuantizer
member.summary: Quantize using an Octree

member.name: M:ImageQuantization.OctreeQuantizer.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Construct the octree quantizer
member.remarks: The Octree quantizer is a two pass algorithm. The initial pass sets up the octree, the second pass quantizes a color based on the nodes in the tree
member.param: The maximum number of colors to return
The number of significant bits

member.name: M:ImageQuantization.OctreeQuantizer.Reset
member.summary: Clears the octree

member.name: M:ImageQuantization.OctreeQuantizer.Reset(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Clears the octree and reconfigures color settings

member.summary: Process the pixel in the first pass of the algorithm
member.param: The pixel to quantize
member.remarks: This function need only be overridden if your quantize algorithm needs two passes, such as an Octree quantizer.

member.name: F:ImageQuantization.OctreeQuantizer.DitherMatrix
member.summary: a Floyd-Steinberg dither matrix new float[,] {{0,0,0}, {0,0,0.44f}, {0.19f,0.31f,0.06f}};

member.summary: Override this to process the pixel in the second pass of the algorithm
member.param: The pixel to quantize

member.name: T:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageManager
member.summary: Provides methods for generating resizied images, and for reading and writing them to disk.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageManager.getBestInstance
member.summary: Looks for AnimatedImageManager and returns an instance of that if possible. Otherwise, returns an ImageManager instance.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageManager.BuildImage(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Takes sourceFile, resizes it, and saves it to targetFile using the querystring values in request.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageManager.HasResizingDirective(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Returns true if the specified querystring collection uses a resizing command

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageManager.IsOneSpecified(System.String[])
member.summary: Returns true if one or more of the arguments has a non-null or non-empty value

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageManager.BuildImage(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Generates a resized bitmap from the specifed source file and the specified querystring. Understands width/height and maxwidth/maxheight. Throws either an ArgumentException or IOException if the source image is invalid.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageManager.BuildImage(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Creates a new bitmap of the required size, and draws the specified image (with border, background, padding, and shadow).

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageManager.BuildImage(System.Drawing.Bitmap,fbs.ImageResizer.ResizeSettings,fbs.ImageResizer.ImageSettings,fbs.ImageResizer.ImageFilter,fbs.ImageResizer.ImageOutputSettings,fbs.ImageResizer.WatermarkSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new bitmap of the required size, and draws the specified image (with border, background, padding, and shadow). Accepts parallelagrams, so rotation and skew is permitted. Use SelectActiveFrame() to select the right frame prior to calling BuildImage
member.param: The page or frame. Use 0 for default.
Optional, can be null. Plugin for watermarking code

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageManager.DrawOuterGradient(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Draws a gradient around the specified polygon. Fades from 'inner' to 'outer' over a distance of 'width' pixels.

member.name: T:fbs.ImageResizer.CustomFolders
member.summary: Here is where you can set up custom image size defaults for folders (or any pattern you want). You can also perform URL rewriting on your images.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.CustomFolders.processPath(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary:
Called for all image requests during PostAuthorizeRequest.
Any custom URL syntaxes can be parsed here - just populate 'q' with the resulting data.
This method returns the 'real' path of the image, i.e. /app/img/file.jpg will be returned for /app/img/resize(50,50,jpg)/file.jpg
Should be very fast - don't make and I/O or database calls here. AllowURLRewriting must be enabled if you want to return something other than 'filePath'. You can still populate the querystring without this setting. AllowURLRewriting is required for the /resize(50,50,jpg)/ syntax.
This is the only method the rest of the the image resizer touches. If you don't care for the applyDefaults(), applyOverrides(), and resize(w,h,f) syntax, feel free to delete everything else in this class and provide your own implementation of this method.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.CustomFolders.applyDefaults(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Settings inserted here are overridden by the querystring values. (q gets overwritten with a copy of the original querystring, so only untouched parameters can be changed) q is populated with the original querystring values to start.
member.param: The virtual domain-relative path (/app/folder/file.jpg). Doesn't include the querystring.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.CustomFolders.applyOverrides(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Settings inserted here override the querystring values.
member.param: The virtual domain-relative path (/app/folder/file.jpg). Doesn't include the querystring.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.CustomFolders.resizeMatch(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: If substring is found within 'path', q["maxwidth"], q["maxheight"], and q["format"] are set to the specified values. Use -1 or null to omit a value.

member.name: F:fbs.ImageResizer.CustomFolders.resizeFolder
member.summary: Matches /resize(x,y,f)/ syntax Fixed Bug - will replace both slashes.. make first a lookbehind

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.CustomFolders.parseResizeFolderSyntax(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Parses and removes the resize folder syntax "resize(x,y,f)/" from the specified file path. Places settings into the referenced querystring
member.param: The collection to place parsed values into

member.name: T:fbs.ImageResizer.InterceptModule
member.summary: Monitors incoming image requests. Image requests that request resizing are processed. The resized images are immediately written to disk, and the request is rewritten to the disk-cached resized version. This way IIS can handle the actual serving of the file. The disk-cache directory is protected through URL authorization. See CustomFolders.cs for any type of URL rewriting

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.InterceptModule.System#Web#IHttpModule#Init(System.Web.HttpApplication)
member.summary: Called when the app is initialized

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.InterceptModule.CheckRequest_PostAuthorizeRequest(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This is where we filter requests and intercet those that want resizing performed. We first check for image extensions... If it is one, then we run it through the CustomFolders methods to see if if there is custom resizing for it.. If there still aren't any querystring params after that, then we ignore the request. If the file doesn't exist, we also ignore the request. They're going to cause a 404 anyway.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.InterceptModule.getCachedVersionFilename(fbs.yrl)
member.summary: Builds the physical path for the cached version, using the hashcode of the normalized URL.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.InterceptModule.ResizeRequest(System.Web.HttpContext,fbs.yrl)
member.summary: Generates the resized image to disk (if needed), then rewrites the request to that location. Perform 404 checking before calling this method. Assumes file exists. Called during PostAuthorizeRequest

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.InterceptModule.context_PreSendRequestHeaders(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: We don't actually send the data - but we still want to control the headers on the data. PreSendRequestHeaders allows us to change the content-type and cache headers at excatly the last second. We populate the headers from context.Items["FinalContentType"], context.Items["ContentExpires"], and context.Items["FinalCachedFile"]. This also indirectly enables server-side mem caching. (HttpCacheability.Public does it) We set the file dependency to FinalCachedFile so changes are update quickly server-side - however, clients will not check for updates until ContentExpires occurs.

member.name: T:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageSettings
member.summary: TODO: later implement border, padding, and shadow support

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageSettings.parseFromQuerystring(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: bgcolor=(transparent/white) paddingColor=(transparent/white) paddingWidth=x borderWidth=x borderColor=black shadowWidth=x shadowColor=black shadowOffset(x,y)|both

member.name: T:fbs.ImageResizer.ImageFilter
member.summary: Eventually I will extend this class to allow grayscale, brightness, alpha, and possibly contrast adjustment.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.Animation.GifCreator.CreateGraphicControlExtensionBlock(System.Int32,System.Byte)
member.summary: Written before each frame - specifies the frame's delay and the index of the transparent color

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.Animation.GifCreator.CreateLoopBlock
member.summary: Creates a Loop Block (Netscape appliation extension) for infinite looping. Written after the last frame's image data

member.summary: Dissects a GIF image into its component parts.

member.name: M:fbs.ImageResizer.Animation.AnimatedImageManager.BuildImage(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Takes sourceFile, resizes it, and saves it to targetFile using the querystring values in request. This is the only method that supports animated GIF output. GDI has no native support for animated GIFs, so we have to take a different code path.
